Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute near 79th/Perry
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses temp. rerouted EB: 79th, Vincennes, 76th, Lafayette, and 79th; WB: 79th, State, 76th, Vincennes, and 79th due to, street blockage near 79th/Perry.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 79th/Perry, due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via 79th, Vincennes, 76th, Lafayette, and 79th.

Westbound buses will operate via 79th, State, 76th, Vincennes, and 79th.

Allow extra travel time.
